tool_description: get COVID related news articles from Kompas, Tribun News, Detik, Merdeka, Okezone
name: COVID-Related-Indonesias-News-Article
title: COVID-Related-Indonesias-News-Article

api_list.name: Get specific COVID related news source articles
api_list.description: get a specific out of five sources COVID related news articles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-related-indonesias-news-article.p.rapidapi.com/covid/kompas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-related-indonesias-news-article.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-related-indonesias-news-article.p.rapidapi.com/covid/{source}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-related-indonesias-news-article.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Indonesia's COVID Related News
api_list.description: get live recent covid related news data from 5  Indonesia's news website (Kompas, Detik, Okezone, Tribun, Merdeka )
